channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AWS SageMaker is transforming into a combined data and AI hub
item.description: The next-generation of SageMaker will make accessing data assets and wide-ranging tools to make the most of them faster than ever.

item.title: AWS and Riot Games name winner of Valorant Champions Tour Hackathon
item.description: AWS and Riot Games have revealed the winners of their Valorant Champions Tour Hackathon: Esports Manager Challenge.

item.title: What Trump’s plan to end IRS ‘overstepping’ could mean for audits of rich people — and call hold times for everyone else
item.description: The incoming Trump team wants to change the IRS mentality from “we’re the tax police,” one expert said.

item.title: Google Cloud launches Veo AI video generator model on Vertex
item.description: Unveiled at Google’s I/O developer conference, Veo is Google DeepMind’s response to competitors like Runway’s Gen-3 and OpenAI's Sora.

item.title: Amazon launches Nova AI model family for generating text, images and videos
item.description: Nova Reel outperformed Runway's Gen-3 Alpha in A/B testing, achieving winning rates of 61.4% for video quality.

item.title: Stocks and bonds haven’t moved together like this in three decades – and that’s putting portfolios at risk, says State Street
item.description: A so-called balanced portfolio is anything but given the correlation of stock and bond returns as well as concentration in stocks.

item.title: AWS Bedrock upgrades to add model teaching, hallucination detector
item.description: AWS updated Bedrock with two new capabilities, one to let large models teach smaller models and another to catch and correct hallucinations.
